about_the_game:
Official high-definition stills from 108 Silly Ways to Die

Includes:

  • Over 20 ultra-high-definition crew photos taken during the game filming process.

  • Exciting behind-the-scenes images.

About the usage of DLC:

When this DLC is purchased, it will automatically download to the root directory of the game if the main game is already downloaded.

You can directly access this directory by going to your Steam library, right-clicking on this game, selecting 'Manage', and then 'Browse Local Files'.

It is included in a folder named "HD stills" within the directory.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some nudity, sexual innuendo, and other sensitive content. 
Some scenes are unsettling and horrific, implying violence, bloodshed, and the mutilation of the human body. 
It may have a realistic triggering effect on players with potential sensitivities and may not be suitable for all age groups.

name: 108 Silly Ways to Die - HD stills
short_description: Official stills from 108 Silly Ways to Die, including a large number of photos taken during the filming process.
